content:
Phone Book Tile: Updates and Feedback Analysis
- Description: Addition of new resources to the phone book based on patient and family interests, along with analysis of feedback from previous tiles.
- Benefit: Ensures patients and families have access to relevant resources and adjusts the care plan based on their feedback.
- 
Check-in Tile: Medication Review
- Description: A video-based check-in tile that reviews inhaler usage, medication benefits, and collects information on the patient's breathing abilities, vitals, medications, and community resources.
- Benefit: Reinforces the importance of medication compliance and helps track the patient's progress.
Coaching Call: Orientation Review
- Care manager reviews the patient's progress, compliance, and comfort based on their interactions with the tiles and addresses any concerns or questions.
- Benefit: Fosters a supportive relationship between the patient and care manager, ensuring the patient feels heard and understood.
Encouragement Tile: Post-Call Follow-Up
- Description: A follow-up note with positive reinforcement and patient testimonials of success.
- Benefit: Motivates patients by showcasing positive outcomes and fosters a sense of accomplishment.
